posts.title: Exporting Map’s Jpeg file Methods
posts.description: In this blog, I share my experience of exporting over 1,000 map images as JPEGs and TIFFs. I compare various methods, including Google Earth Engine, Geemap, and ArcGIS Pro with ArcPy, and explain how I chose the most efficient approach for automated, high-quality image exports.

posts.title: RA Project: Satellite Image Collection
posts.description: Collecting the satellite images from the Google Earth Engine, and save them to the Google Drive and make file be searchable and accessible by using Google Cloud App Engine, Flask, ArcGIS SDK, for Model training preprocessing.

posts.title: Research Paper: Advanced Multimodal Deep Learning Architecture for Image-Text Matching
posts.description: This is a sample publication. Pending to be published.

posts.title: ArcGIS Map SDK Swift Setup: API Key, Licenses & iOS Dev Guide
posts.description: Video: ArcGIS Map SDK Swift Setup: API Key, Licenses & iOS Dev Guide. How to create api and license for ArcGIS Map SDK Swift.

posts.title: Hackathon Project: Visign
posts.description: ViSign detects and translates sign language gestures into semantically accurate sentences using Mediapipi for hand and body behavior detection, TensorFlow for word translation, Google's Gemini for sentence generation, and is deployed on Vercel with Flask as the model backend.

posts.title: Volunteer at Esri Dev Summit 2024
posts.description: Volunteer at Esri Dev Summit 2024, and help the attendees

posts.title: DualSense Controller Exploring For Developer, Features, Capabilities, Usage Demo
posts.description: Introduction to DualSense Controller, Features, Capabilities, Usage Demo, based on the PS5 controller and the input and output features.

posts.title: Mapview to Image ArcGIS SDK for Swift
posts.description: The blog details the process of exporting an image from the MapView in the ArcGIS SDK for Swift, highlighting challenges with empty images and the solution involving a loading delay.

posts.title: MIRA - VisionPro APP: AI-Enhanced Conversation Assistance
posts.description: MIRA (Stanford Hackathon project)- VisionPro APP is an advanced AI-driven tool that integrates LLMs (Large Language Models) to enhance conversations by generating immersive 3D scenes based on discussion topics. It supports Text-to-Speech (TTS) and Speech-to-Text (STT) capabilities while delivering an engaging user experience through Swift and SwiftUI technologies.

posts.title: GEEExpUI - Google Earth Engine Export Tif files to Google Drive
posts.description: GEEExpUI is a user-friendly desktop application for exporting high-resolution TIFF files from Google Earth Engine to Google Drive

posts.title: LivCap - Privacy-First Live Caption App for macOS
posts.description: Privacy first - on-device live caption, no data collection. 1.7x word-level lead rate and 10% reduced latency compared with default macOS live caption. Open source and free to download through the App Store, and more features are coming soon.

posts.title: Quick Findings: On-Device ASR Performance on macOS
posts.description: Here's a rapid rundown of my experiment comparing five on-device ASR models. 2025 July

posts.title: Dualsense-ALOHA: Controller Teleoperation for ACT IL Training
posts.description: Dualsense Controller Teleoperation and ACT IL Policy on ALOHA for one bigym task.  Implemented a multi-buffer inference system for improved movement stability, and applied an inference result scaler to address action attenuation—ensuring that the movement amplitude was sufficient to avoid object penetration in this scenario 100% avoided.  Integrated MuJoCo Warp in headless mode, achieving a 10x increase in step speed.

posts.title: Playsense-ID: Haptic-Enhanced Multimodal Biometric Authentication for Gaming Controller Users
posts.description: A method based on linear resonant actuator from dualsense controller, with human handing posture, and LSTM molde, gains the biometics features. Achieved an accuracy of 98.5% and reducing Equal Error Rate (EER) to 0.4%. Robustness and generalization tests, conducted under varying environmental conditions and background noise scenarios

posts.title: IK Solver for Xlerobot in Isaac Sim
posts.description: A technical walkthrough of implementing an inverse kinematics (IK) solver for the Xlerobot platform in NVIDIA Isaac Sim. Covers the process of integrating custom robot URDFs, setting up the simulation environment, and developing a Python-based IK solution for precise end-effector control. Includes practical insights, code snippets, and troubleshooting tips for robotics researchers and developers working with Isaac Sim.

posts.title: ReLL: Reproduce Learned Localization with GICP Registration of Lidar&DSM
posts.description: A complete reproduction of the learned localization pipeline using GICP registration for LiDAR and Digital Surface Model (DSM) alignment. Covers implementation details omitted from the original paper, including data preparation, model architecture, and training procedures. Demonstrates that GICP significantly improves alignment accuracy, achieving translation RMS of ~0.1m at 0.2m resolution. Compares refinement techniques (softmax, Gaussian peak fitting) and identifies the correlation between localization quality and LiDAR point coverage.

posts.title: AI Learning Assistant (MERN)
posts.description: AI-powered learning assistant leveraging advanced language models to support personalized learning, automate study tasks, and enhance user engagement with smart recommendations and interaction tools, based on the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).

posts.title: nowrobotaxi.com – GIS Web Platform for RoboTaxi Service Development Visualization
posts.description: An GIS based  a web application providing information and services for RoboTaxi technology, optimized geosptial data loading from 400ms to 100ms, using the Cloudflare D1 , Mapbox, Nextjs
